name: As Sylam 2 - The "Cure"
description:
Hey Guys!!!

As Sylam Two is finally finished and This is a shorter game for you who don't

like the lengthy adventure games.

There is no fighting, Just a twist of a story, So if you are into a CRAZY story,

This is the game you have been waiting for.

Hope you all enjoy, Please leave a comment if you think there

is something I can make better.

Thank you
